ace_sentences: I noticed a fact about sports leagues.
Every sports league except Major League Baseball has at least 50% of its players as players of color.
The average percentage of head coaches of color is 25.8%.
I wonder why there is a big difference between the percentage of coaches of color and the percentage of athletes of color.
This difference might affect our community.
This difference might create a stereotype about the color of a person for a certain sport.
The headline is: Racial Percent Difference in Sports Leagues.
